instructions_to_main_agent: Use 'Manrope' for all Headings and 'Plus Jakarta Sans' for body text. Add these fonts via Google Fonts in index.html.
Implement smooth scrolling using CSS 'scroll-behavior: smooth'.
Ensure the Contact Form uses Shadcn Form components and has validation.
The WhatsApp button must open 'https://wa.me/<number>' in a new tab.
Use the specific image URLs provided in the assets section.
Do not use generic blue gradients. Use solid colors or very subtle mesh gradients.
Ensure high contrast for text (Slate-900 for headings, Slate-600 for body).
universal_guidelines: Do not use generic centered layouts everywhere. Use asymmetry.
Add micro-interactions to all buttons and cards (hover lift, color shift).
Use plenty of whitespace (padding-y-24 for sections).
Make sure the mobile view is optimized (stack columns, adjust text sizes).
